thread.title: MusicNews | Miley Cyrus & The Flaming Lips are planning to play a gig while completely naked
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Miley Cyrus & The Flaming Lips are planning to play a gig while completely naked - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | Miley Cyrus & The Flaming Lips are planning to play a gig while completely naked
text:
The friendship between Miley Cyrus and The Flaming Lips has been well-documented in recent times, with the band collaborating with her on her recent 'Miley Cyrus & Her Dead Petz' album.
Now, frontman Wayne Coyne has claimed that they will perform at a gig together in the near future, totally naked. Oh, and that goes for the audience, too. Yes, if you plan on attending, you'll be covered in the same 'white stuff that looks like milk ' as the band and Cyrus.
Why, you may ask? It's for the video of album track ' Milky Milk Milk'.
With Cyrus set to head out on the road with The Flaming Lips for some live dates next month, the video shoot could take place sooner than expected.
See Coyne's Instagram photo, where he broke the news, below:
Oh fuck..!!! @mileycyrus is planning a show where her, the band ( us ) and the audience are all COMPLETELY naked with milk ( well white stuff that looks like milk) is being being spewed everywhere .. It's a video ( in the works) for #mileycyrusandherdeadpetz song The Milky Milky Milk... @stevendrozd @derek_levi_brown @mileycyrus @katyweaver @spacefacemusic @rockworth @leochandler @fantastic_ley @jgeeezus @zacharyancox @alphachanneling @mugglinstagram @monamuseum @happyhippiefdn @waynez__world @weirddestiny @drc3p0 @damienhirst #flaminglips #waynecoyne #mileycyrusandherdeadpetz #theflaminglips
